info.title: Catalog Microservices
info.description: Python microservice for retrieving product catalog data.

post.summary: Get the redirect path for a given path.
post.description: Provides the redirection path for an input path.

parameters.name: requestPath
parameters.description: Request path to be mapped.

get.summary: Stores information endpoints
get.description: Allows retrieval of store details by site id or by site id and store number.  If stores param is not specified all stores for site-id/brand code will be returned.  Site ids correspond to a given brand code as follows: (uo-us, uo-ca) := uo-us, (uo-uk,uo-fr, uo-de) := uo-eu, (an-us) := an-us,  (an-uk, an-de, an-fr) := an-eu, (fp-us, fp-uk, fp-cn) := fp

206.description: If the search was query based and we didn't find all store ids specified

400.description: No brand code found for site id

post.summary: Get stores by geo location and item inventory
post.description: Allows retrieval of store details by latitude, longitude, country code, maximum distance, and items

parameters.name: inventorysource
parameters.description: Source of inventory data. If not provided, will use Yantriks (if enabled).

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Location coordinates, country code, maximum distance, and items to query by

400.description: Invalid latitude, longitude, country code, distance, units, or items

get.summary: Get BazaarVoice Review response for a product slug
get.description: Provides a passthrough to BazaarVoice read reviews endpoint

parameters.name: review-template
parameters.description: The review template to be returned from BazaarVoice

get.summary: Get navigation hierarchy for a site
get.description: Provides full or partial hierarchy of navigable pages for a site and breadcrumbs for a partial hierarchy

parameters.name: structure
parameters.description: Desired structure of the response

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Desired slug to create partial navigation from

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: Desired category ID to create partial navigation from

parameters.name: navigation
parameters.description: Flag to determine whether to include navigation in response

parameters.name: breadcrumbs
parameters.description: Flag to determine whether to include breadcrumbs in response

parameters.name: nestLevel
parameters.description: The maximum depth of nesting for navigation items returned for a partial navigation

post.summary: Post navigation hierarchy for a channel and language
post.description: This is a private api that Provides an update for the full hierarchy of navigable pages for a site

get.summary: Get navigation hierarchy for a site
get.description: Provides full hierarchy of navigable pages for a site

parameters.name: navigation
parameters.description: Flag to determine whether to include navigation in response

parameters.name: breadcrumbs
parameters.description: Flag to determine whether to include breadcrumbs in response

parameters.name: nestLevel
parameters.description: The maximum depth of nesting for navigation items returned for a partial navigation

get.summary: Default browse page for a navigation item
get.description: Get a default list of products related to a navigation item

parameters.name: feature-product-ids
parameters.description: Comma seperated list of product ids to return first in results

200.description: Success - response body is documented here: http://docs.cloud.groupbyinc.com/

externalDocs.description: Response body with be the structure defined by Group By

post.summary: Filter browse page for a navigation item
post.description: Get a list of products related to a navigation item based on the filter post body.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Filter request details - accepts sort, pageSize, skip, refinements, disableAutocorrect, query, projection, projectionSlug and featureProductIds - groupby schema documented here: http://docs.cloud.groupbyinc.com/

200.description: Success  - response body is documented here: http://docs.cloud.groupbyinc.com/

externalDocs.description: Response body with be the structure defined by Group By

post.description: Get a list of products related to a search based on the filter post body.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Filter request details, using groupby schema: - only accepts sort, pageSize, skip, refinements, disableAutocorrect, projection, projectionSlug and query  - request body is documented here: http://docs.cloud.groupbyinc.com/

200.description: Success  - response body is documented here: http://docs.cloud.groupbyinc.com/

externalDocs.description: Response body with be the structure defined by Group By

get.summary: Product Keyword Search
get.description: Get product information based on the search against the given keyword.

400.description: If you do not provide a slug, productId or styleNumber query param

post.summary: Product, price, and full inventory results.
post.description: Get a list of products, with full price and inventory data based on the post body.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The items to search for

206.description: Partial Success.  Not all products requested were found.

get.summary: Get estimated delivery information for a sku
get.description: Get estimated delivery date details from Yantriks for a sku.

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: Comma separated list of sku ids to request estimated delivery details for (eg. 1324,5678)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country to use in estimated delivery details request

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: Zip code to use in estimated delivery details request. Optional if outside of US/CA.

200.description: Success: all, some, or no ship methods returned.

400.description: The request is invalid. Missing sku, country, or zip (for US and CA), country is invalid, or too many skus were requested.

get.summary: [Deprecated] Use /{siteId}/sayt/products/keywords/searches instead
get.description: [Deprecated] Use /{siteId}/sayt/products/keywords/searches instead

200.description: Success  - response body is documented here: http://docs.cloud.groupbyinc.com/

externalDocs.description: Response body with be the structure defined by Group By

get.summary: Type ahead search results.
get.description: Gets a list of product keywords based on query param.

200.description: Success  - response body is documented here: http://docs.cloud.groupbyinc.com/

externalDocs.description: Response body with be the structure defined by Group By

get.summary: Type ahead search results.
get.description: Gets a list of products based on query params.

200.description: Success  - response body is documented here: http://docs.cloud.groupbyinc.com/

externalDocs.description: Response body with be the structure defined by Group By

get.summary: Gets popular product suggestions
get.description: Gets a list of popular productIds from GroupBy and orchestrates additional product fields needed to display the product suggestions.

get.summary: Gets trending keywords search suggestions
get.description: Gets trending keywords search suggestions by calling GBY's API and returning the full GBY response.

get.summary: Get the config for a given brand
get.description: Get the site group and country config for a particular brand

parameters.name: brandId
parameters.description: Brand code for brand you are trying to access

parameters.name: countryId
parameters.description: Country code for brand you are trying to access eg: US, GB, CA

404.description: Country Config or Site Group Not Found Error

get.summary: Get the site config for a given site
get.description: Get the site config for a particular site

get.summary: Get the current currency conversion config
get.description: Get the current currency conversion config for supported currencies.

get.summary: Get the countries config for a given site_id
get.description: Get the countries config for a particular site_id

get.summary: Get the country config for a given site_id and country combination
get.description: Get the country config  for a given site_id and country combination

get.summary: Get valid regions
get.description: Get the valid regions for a given country and postal code combination. Requires PROFILE_SERVICE token scope.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: 'Bearer ' + token with PROFILE_SERVICE scope

200.description: Successful response - the valid regions given the country and postal code

get.summary: Get the current pxp public key
get.description: Get the current pxp public key for the requested site

get.summary: Product Detail
get.description: Get product attributes, primary slice (i.e. color) attributes, skus, plus availability for requested pools.

206.description: Partial Success.  Not all products requested were found.

400.description: If you do not provide a slug, productId or styleNumber query param. Multiple productids or style numbers or slugs cannot be combined with include-pools

get.summary: Product Sku Info Detail
get.description: Get the sku info of a product by product id. (NOTE: This API can only be used by TIBCO.)

get.summary: Product Sku Info Detail (merged)
get.description: Get the sku info for all products with a specified style number. (NOTE: This API can only be used by TIBCO.)

get.summary: Get all brands on site id.
get.description: Return a list of all brands for the siteId specified in the url. This endpoint is still available, but `/{siteId}/pools/{poolId}/brands` is preferred.

get.summary: Get all brands on site id and pool id.
get.description: Return a list of all brands for the siteId and poolId specified in the url.

get.summary: Get all brands on site id and navigation name
get.description: Return list of all brands for the site-id, navigation name specified in url

post.summary: Check inventory for skus in case of Sterling outage (Internal use ONLY)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Ship buckets containing 'items'

get.summary: Get all product compoents for site id and language
get.description: Returns a list of product components for a site id and language

200.description: Components list for site id and language

get.summary: Get all components for site id, language, and product id
get.description: Returns a list of components for a site, language, and product

200.description: Components for site id, language, and product based on either smart or finished SKU

206.description: Components and unavailable components for site id, language, and product based on either smart or finished SKU

400.description: Missing required headers or query parameters

get.summary: Get information about a seller
get.description: Get a seller's information using its sellerId.

200.description: A seller matching the search criteria

get.summary: Get information about an offer
get.description: Get a offer's information using its offerId.

200.description: An offer matching the search criteria

get.summary: Get retail information about a product
get.description: Get product information using a sku

sellerAuthorizationBearerParam.name: Authorization
sellerAuthorizationBearerParam.description: 'Bearer ' + Guest or registered or Tibco authentication token

productSlugParam.name: slug
productSlugParam.description: Product slug to be used in identifying which product style number is being targeted

navSlugParam.name: slug
navSlugParam.description: Navigation item to be used as the root of the navigation tree in response

siteIdParam.name: siteId
siteIdParam.description: Site code for the site you are trying to access

productIdParam.name: productId
productIdParam.description: Product id of the product you are trying to access

productIdQueryParam.name: product-id
productIdQueryParam.description: Comma separated list of product ids to retrieve (i.e. 132,4316). This, styleNumber, slug OR sku is REQUIRED.

poolIdParam.name: poolId
poolIdParam.description: Unique id to indicate pool. Products returned based on availability within given pool.

navigationSlugParam.name: navigationSlug
navigationSlugParam.description: Navigation item you are trying to retrieve products for.

skuIdParam.name: skuId
skuIdParam.description: Sku id to look up relevant data for a sku

pruneParam.name: prune
pruneParam.description: Flag to prune the product response

skipParam.name: skip
skipParam.description: Number of products to skip (multiple of page-size)

qParam.name: q
qParam.description: The search term to get trending keyword suggestions for. Must be a full word to get results. GroupBy only searches on full words.

offsetParam.name: offset
offsetParam.description: The number of reviews to skip before starting the returned reviews

limitParam.name: limit
limitParam.description: The number of results to return from the total result set. If specified, limit must be a value 1 - 100. If no limit is specified, it will default to 10.

urbnSearchLimitParam.name: limit
urbnSearchLimitParam.description: The number of results to return from the total result set from URBNSearch. If no limit is specified, it will default to 5.

windowParam.name: window
windowParam.description: The time window to query for trending keyword suggestions. Must be one of ["day", "week", "month"]. If no window is specified, it will default to week.

storesParam.name: stores
storesParam.description: Comma separated store numbers to search (i.e. '004,001')

slugParam.name: slug
slugParam.description: Comma separated list of product slugs to retrieve (i.e. grip-it-rug-pad,moroccan-cross-rug). This, styleNumber OR productId is REQUIRED

merchandiseClassParam.name: merchandise-class
merchandiseClassParam.description: The merchandise class of the product being requested (used to determine proper review template)

styleNumberParam.name: style-number
styleNumberParam.description: Comma separated list of style numbers to retrieve (i.e. 132,4316). This, productId, slug OR sku is REQUIRED.

skuParam.name: sku
skuParam.description: Comma separated list of sku ids to retrieve (i.e. 132,4316). This, productId, styleNumber OR slug is REQUIRED.

excludeFilterParam.name: exclude-filter
excludeFilterParam.description: Key indicating what to exclude from results (oos-color = out of stock colors)

includePoolsParam.name: include-pools
includePoolsParam.description: Comma separated list of store pools to include inventory at sku level

inventorySourceParam.name: inventorysource
inventorySourceParam.description: Source of inventory data. If not provided, will use Yantriks (if enabled). [DEPRECATED: Use include-realtime-inventory query param or X-Urbn-Include-Realtime-Inventory header]

includeRealtimeInventoryParam.name: include-realtime-inventory
includeRealtimeInventoryParam.description: Whether or not inventory data should be realtime. If not provided, data will be realtime.

xUrbnIncludeRealtimeInventoryParam.name: X-Urbn-Include-Realtime-Inventory
xUrbnIncludeRealtimeInventoryParam.description: Whether or not inventory data should be realtime. If not provided, data will be realtime.

searchSourceParam.name: searchsource
searchSourceParam.description: Search source to use (i.e. gocatss). Any other search source is going to use groupby by default

navigationNameParam.name: navigationName
navigationNameParam.description: Navigation name to search for brands of

smartSkuParam.name: smart-sku
smartSkuParam.description: The smart SKU to look up components of the product

finishedSkuParam.name: finished-sku
finishedSkuParam.description: The finished SKU to look up components of the product

sellerIdParam.name: sellerId
sellerIdParam.description: The numeric ID of the seller you are trying to look up

offerIdParam.name: offerId
offerIdParam.description: The numeric ID of the offer you are trying to look up

projectionParam.name: projection
projectionParam.description: JSON object denoting the document structure to be returned on successful responses, with truthy values indicating that a key should return

projectionSlugParam.name: projection-slug
projectionSlugParam.description: Named projection keyword to customize the responses to only include data that is needed

includeUnavailableParam.name: include-unavailable
includeUnavailableParam.description: Flag to determine whether or not to include unavailable products for POS

subpoolQueryParam.name: subpool
subpoolQueryParam.description: subpool to refine by, eg US_EAST_DIRECT

SiteId.description: Site code for the site you are trying to access

count.description: Total number of products with this brand name

deliveryDaysThresholdExceeded.description: Flag that is true if delivery date is greater than the threshold set in the site config

relatedProducts.description: If present, this is a map of product id to related product data
If present, this is a map of product id to related product data

PopularProductsResponse.description: Each element represents the GroupBy response plus the orchestrated product data (similar to the GET /products response)

fieldErrors.description: If there are field errors a list of them

field.description: field name of field with error

message.description: User friendly error message for code

deliveryDateInfo.description: Delivery date selling channel and ranges

reviewTemplate.description: Bazaarvoice template definition to display on the PDP

templateName.description: Name of the template being used from Bazaarvoice
Name of the template being used from Bazaarvoice

items.description: Merchandise class found on the products

avlPoolSellingChannelLookup.description: Mapping of pool to selling channel

deliveryDayRangesByServiceLevel.description: Mapping of service level to delivery day ranges and threshold

isRegistry.description: Indicator if this gift wrap supports registry items

prices.description: Map of currency code to price (e.g. {USD: 4.95, CAD: 5.95})

id.description: Deprecated.  This property is returned for FP, but not for AN and UO. See poolId.

countryCode.description: Deprecated.  This property is returned for FP, but not for AN and UO. See country.

name.description: Deprecated.  This property is returned for FP, but not for AN and UO.

brand.description: Deprecated.  This property is returned for FP, but not for AN and UO.

regions.description: Regions belonging to a pool, currently not populated for the main direct pools

targetCurrency.description: ISO currency code for target currency

sourceCurrency.description: ISO currency code for source currency

conversionRate.description: Conversion rate to go from source to target currencies

defaultLanguage.description: The default language for the country

name.description: The payment name eg:- Credit Cards

active.description: If The payment type is active

acceptedCreditCards.description: This field is populated only under the CREDIT_CARD payment type and is the list of credit card types  accepted eg:- ['MC','VISA']

Loc.description: Latitude and longitude of store location

Hours.description: Store hours by day of week 1-7

MaxLeadTimeDays.description: Maximum lead time in days for components

Component.description: Component object containing components for site id and language

primary.description: Indicates if component is the primary component

leadTimeDays.description: Lead time in days for component

components.description: Component object containing components for site id and language

leadTimeDays.description: Lead time in days for component

unavailableComponents.description: Component object containing unavailable components for site id and language
